findings.title: Unnecessary condition
findings.description: At Line 875-877, unnecessary condition because of line 878 will return 0 as last statement anyway

findings.title: Main Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is „“^0.8.0””.

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change
